ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors thank all members of the study teams including the Universal Test and Treat Trials Consortium (UT3C), the communities where we work, our sponsors, and all the policy makers, organizations and community members around the world engaging in efforts of HIV epidemic control. The views expressed here represent those of the authors only.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: The trials in which this article is based on was funded by the National Institutes of Health (NIAID, NIDA, NIMH), President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, Gilead Sciences, Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, French National Agency for Research on AIDS and Viral Hepatitis, and Deutsche Gesellschaft fur Internationale Zusammenarbeit. The content in this article reflect the opinions of the authors and is not a reflection of the sponsors.
